channel.title: Electronics on Aniruddha Deb
channel.description: Recent content in Electronics on Aniruddha Deb

item.title: Icosahedron Resistor Network
item.description: Consider the icosahedral resistance network shown in the following figure. Each edge is made of a rod of resistance $r$. Select the option(s) that is(are) correct: A) The resistance between points A and B is $\frac{r}{2}$ B) The resistance between points A and B is $\frac{r}{3}$ C) The resistance between any two adjacent vertices is $\frac{11r}{30}$ D) The resistance between any two adjacent vertices is $\frac{11r}{20}$ This question looks really tricky.
